objects.text:
• Premium black leather upper
• Distinctive blue laces
• Classic Derby construction
• Versatile formal wear

product_details.name: Executive Edge: Modern Derby Dress Shoes with Blue Accent Laces
product_details.description:
• Premium black leather upper with sleek finish
• Distinctive blue laces for a contemporary twist
• Classic Derby style construction for versatile wear
• Minimalist design perfect for formal and business occasions
• Sophisticated black interior lining
• Durable leather sole for long-lasting comfort
• Slim silhouette with elegant pointed toe
• Contrast stitching detail enhances visual appeal
• Available in professional black colorway
• Perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern style

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and sleek product promotion layout, ideal for showcasing formal footwear. The background consists of a geometric grid pattern with intersecting lines and transparent circles, creating depth and a structured aesthetic. Four distinct square background blocks in various dark blue shades enhance visual segmentation. A pair of classic derby shoes with blue laces is prominently displayed on the right. Key text layers include a bold two-part heading (`heading_1` and `heading_2`), a futuristic subheading (`subheading`), a detailed feature list (`description`), an emphasized price tag (`price`), and a bold call-to-action button (`cta`) backed by a contrasting colored rectangle (`cta_button_background`).

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#192f4d`
- Deep Navy: `#0d1a2e`
- Slate Blue: `#283d5c`
- Steel Blue: `#1e3a5f`
- Accent Blue: `#4c82c3`
- Light Blue Circle: `#447cb3`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek pair of formal shoes with a striking blend of dark and metallic tones. The primary color is a deep black (#111111), which forms the base of the shoe, giving it a classic, professional look. Accentuating this base, electric blue (#1A3D7C) is used on the laces, seams, and lining—adding a modern, stylish contrast. Slight highlights of metallic navy (#2C3E50) appear subtly throughout the shoe's surface, creating a rich textural depth. These colors are well-blended yet distinctly visible, making the shoes visually appealing. This color palette is ideal for luxury, modern, or fashion-oriented advertising designs.
